snippet: Revival of a humanitarian program would be another step toward a thaw on the divided Korean Peninsula after months of tension.
abstract: North Korea accepts South Korean proposal to discuss reunions of elderly relatives who had been separated from their parents, siblings and children since the Korean War; revival of humanitarian program would be another step toward a thaw on the divided Korean Peninsula after months of tension.
lead_paragraph: Revival of a humanitarian program would be another step toward a thaw on the divided Korean Peninsula after months of tension.

headline.main: North Korea Agrees to Talk About Reunions for Families
headline.print_headline: North Korea Agrees to Talk About Reunions for Families
